Blog.post: boring.. today seem to be a boring day.. wait up quite early .. dun knw wat to do .. erm..than watch tv.. than i noticed that my mama forget to buy my breakfast.. ha.. than after some time she went to buy some stuff me.. ha.. waited for an hour which is already 11 + .. to had my breakfast.. nvm i take it as my lunch though.. ha.. after eating i went to use the computer.. so bored .. so few people online.. than i went to study POA at 2 pm .. do lots of question on trading.. profit and loss.. and balance sheet .. WOW .. i did so many at the end i onli manage to ans one correctlywhich is at around 5 pm.. haha.. i was so so happy .. feel like telling him.. haa.. than mi went to bath. then had my lunch with my dad and mum.. than went back using comp again.. till now.. something funny just now happened.. i was online with one of my friend asking him whether he did recieve this mail anot .. he say no than i forward it to him .. than he reply erm.. you spelled wrongly .. ''receive'' not recieve .. i was like.. erm ok.. haha.. then i say sowwie and his reply was it ok .. at least you knw .. i was like.. ok .. i learn a new word all thanks to him.. haha.. than i went back to my room to do my POA.. haha.. haiz.. wat a funny.. bored day.. prelim exam is coming.. is nearer.. and nearer.. haiz.. count nw 4 days.. OMG>.

tired.. tired..tired.. i am so tired.. trying out all the question and i onli manage to get a few correctly.. it is all worth it.. haiz.. today wake up quite early to had my breakfast outside.. before we went to had breakfast .. my papa bought us to buy fruit for tml praying.. after buying we went to had our breakfast.. then we went home to put the staff then went to the temple behind my house to pray .. praying for my preilm ba.. exam coming.. this wed.. count down 3 more days.. haiz.. then after praying when i reach home is round 11+ by the time i am already half dead liao.. then i went to do some poa question .. then watch tv.. than do POA question.. on and off.. subbendly decide to go swimming but .. at 3+ there comes the rain.. and there goes my swimming plan.. than hav to cancel.. so i went to watch tv again.. than went to had my dinner at my house downstair .. OMG.. the food doesn't taste good at all.. than after eating i went to do my poa again.. than till now i finish .. so relieve.. haiz.. but not happy at all.. tml got POA rememdial .. think will hav lots of question to ask mrs lai ba.. haiz..feeling so sleepy right now.. but i can afford to go to bed so early cause i plan to do some math today.. haiz.. hav to do it soon .. otherwise no time to revise already.. time pass so fast.. can i hav more than 24 hours.. per day .. i need it.. haiz.. feel like crying now.. feeling really tired.. wanna chat with him.. but haiz.. forget it.. life still hav to go on.. hav to jia you le.. hope that he can feel that .. k than hav to go study math already.. BB.. *smile always*.. =)

haiz.. feeling so sleepy right now.. just bath haha.. today sort of a tired day.. so sian.. later hav to do math and POA again .. haiz.. i miss him.. hai.. wat is your is will be your.. wat is not yours will nver mi yours.. haha.. today i went to sch .. give my friend their photo that they order .. walau they nv paid mi back.. haha.. =P actually i dun mind de lor.. is tt my mam kept asking i i had to lied to her say they return liao. haiz.. think hav to take own money to show her .. haiz.. i hate to do this.. very stress.. life suck.. EC. . you better dun overdo .. i will hav my own limit de.. so bad you.. haiz.. wat a day again.. suddenly recall of sth .. so sad.. will you help mi agian ? i need your help.. you promise to help mi de.. you said to mi that whenever i got prob can go find you .. but not this time !?! how come you lai that de.. dun you knw i .... haiz.. nvm.. hope that you will be last last time.. things had change so fast.. people.. things around us.. feeling.. and watever.. why ?haha.. m i thinking too much .. think so haha.. haiz.. think i stop here.. BB.. *smile always*.. count down for prelim.. ha.. 1 more day left.. haiz.. GD luck to all 4n2 .. wish you guys good luck ... hope that we can all pass wif flying colour .. okok.. 4n2 is the best class of all .. haha.. JIA you le ..GUYS..
